Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Chris Andersen?

Chris Andersen is 46 years old.

Where was Chris Andersen born?

Chris Andersen was born in Long Beach, California.

When was Chris Andersen born?

Chris Andersen was born on July 7, 1978.

How tall is Chris Andersen?

Chris Andersen is 6-10 (208 cm) tall.

How much did Chris Andersen weigh when playing?

Chris Andersen weighed 245 lbs (111 kg) when playing.

Is Chris Andersen in the Hall of Fame?

Chris Andersen is not in the Hall of Fame.

What position did Chris Andersen play?

Center and Power Forward.

When did Chris Andersen retire?

Chris Andersen last played in 2017.

What is Chris Andersen's net worth?

Chris Andersen made at least $38,507,101 playing professional basketball.

How much did Chris Andersen make?

Chris Andersen made $5,375,000 in 2015.

What did Chris Andersen average?

Chris Andersen averaged 5.4 points, 5.0 rebounds, and 0.5 assists per game.

How many rings does Chris Andersen have?

Chris Andersen won one championship.

What schools did Chris Andersen attend?

Chris Andersen attended Iola in Iola, Texas and Blinn College.

What are Chris Andersen's nicknames?

Birdman is a nickname for Chris Andersen.
